寢.definition: (bound form) to lie down to sleep or rest; (bound form) bedroom; (bound form) imperial tomb; (literary) to stop; to cease

寢苫枕塊.definition: bed of straw and pillow of clay (idiom); the correct etiquette for a filial son during the mourning period

寢食難安.definition: lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom); fig. extremely worried and troubled
